content: विनुद् {c6c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To strike, pierce. {@--2@} To play on a musical instrument (वीणां, आतोद्यं &c.). {@--3@} To remove, drive away, dispel. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To remove, drive away, dispel, cast off; तापं विनोदय दृष्टिभिः <ls>Gīt. 10</ls>; <ls>Śi. 4. 66</ls>; <ls>Ś. 3. 21</ls>; <ls>Māl. 9. 41.</ls> {@--2@} To pass, spend (as time). {@--3@} To divert, amuse, entertain; क्व नु खल्वात्मानं विनोदयामि <ls>Ś. 3</ls>; लतासु दृष्टिं विनोदयामि <ls>Ś. 6</ls>; <ls>R. 14. 77.</ls> {@--4@} To amuse oneself with; लक्ष्मीर्विमोदयाति येन दिगंतलंबी सोपि त्वदाननरुचिं विजहाति चंद्रः <ls>R. 5. 67.</ls>
